package.name: fonts
package.author: SirAardvark
package.description: A package to convert text to fancy fonts anywhere on your computer!
package.title: Fonts

manifest.name: fonts
manifest.title: Fonts
manifest.description: A package to convert text to fancy fonts anywhere on your computer!
manifest.author: SirAardvark

packageRepo.readme:
# ğ‘­ğ˜°ğ”«ğ˜ğ“¼ Galore
This package allows you to replace any old text with a fancified version using fonts!

## Installation
Install this package using
```sh
espanso install fonts
```

## Usage
This package replaces text found, up to a final colon, with the same text, but fancified using the specified font.

In order for this font to work, you may need to install Python 3 in order to allow the script to run. You can view a tutorial to do that [here](https://www.reddit.com/r/learnpython/comments/8lkmjf/python_3_installation_guide/).

This package also may not be as useful given the Espanso regex limit, which is set to 30 by default. To change this (**highly recommended**), navigate to the Espanso config file and adjust `max_regex_buffer_size:` to a higher value, I recommend anywhere from 500 - 2000 (*note that this will increase Espanso's memory usage*).

| Shortcut     | Name | Example |
|--------------| - | - |
| :b ğ˜µğ˜¦ğ˜¹ğ˜µ: | Bold | ğ—Ÿğ—¼ğ—¿ğ—²ğ—º ğ—œğ—½ğ˜€ğ˜‚ğ—º |
| :i ğ˜µğ˜¦ğ˜¹ğ˜µ: | Italics | ğ˜“ğ˜°ğ˜³ğ˜¦ğ˜® ğ˜ğ˜±ğ˜´ğ˜¶ğ˜® |
| :s ğ˜µğ˜¦ğ˜¹ğ˜µ: | Script | ğ“›ğ“¸ğ“»ğ“®ğ“¶ ğ“˜ğ“¹ğ“¼ğ“¾ğ“¶ |
| :g ğ˜µğ˜¦ğ˜¹ğ˜µ: | Gothic | ğ”ğ”¬ğ”¯ğ”¢ğ”ª â„‘ğ”­ğ”°ğ”²ğ”ª |
| :f ğ˜µğ˜¦ğ˜¹ğ˜µ: | Fancy | ğ‘³ğ’ğ’“ğ’†ğ’ ğ‘°ğ’‘ğ’”ğ’–ğ’ |

packageYml.name: package.yml
packageYml.content:
matches:
  - regex: ":(?P<style>[bisgf]) (?P<text>[^:]+):"
    replace: "{{output}}"
    vars:
      - name: output
        type: script
        params:
          args:
            - python
            - -c
            - |
              import sys, codecs

              # Ensure UTF-8 output
              sys.stdout = codecs.getwriter("utf-8")(sys.stdout.detach())

              style_map = {
                  'b': 'ğ—®ğ—¯ğ—°ğ—±ğ—²ğ—³ğ—´ğ—µğ—¶ğ—·ğ—¸ğ—¹ğ—ºğ—»ğ—¼ğ—½ğ—¾ğ—¿ğ˜€ğ˜ğ˜‚ğ˜ƒğ˜„ğ˜…ğ˜†ğ˜‡ğ—”ğ—•ğ—–ğ——ğ—˜ğ—™ğ—šğ—›ğ—œğ—ğ—ğ—Ÿğ— ğ—¡ğ—¢ğ—£ğ—¤ğ—¥ğ—¦ğ—§ğ—¨ğ—©ğ—ªğ—«ğ—¬ğ—­ğŸ¬ğŸ­ğŸ®ğŸ¯ğŸ°ğŸ±ğŸ²ğŸ³ğŸ´ğŸµ ',
                  'i': 'ğ˜¢ğ˜£ğ˜¤ğ˜¥ğ˜¦ğ˜§ğ˜¨ğ˜©ğ˜ªğ˜«ğ˜¬ğ˜­ğ˜®ğ˜¯ğ˜°ğ˜±ğ˜²ğ˜³ğ˜´ğ˜µğ˜¶ğ˜·ğ˜¸ğ˜¹ğ˜ºğ˜»ğ˜ˆğ˜‰ğ˜Šğ˜‹ğ˜Œğ˜ğ˜ğ˜ğ˜ğ˜‘ğ˜’ğ˜“ğ˜”ğ˜•ğ˜–ğ˜—ğ˜˜ğ˜™ğ˜šğ˜›ğ˜œğ˜ğ˜ğ˜Ÿğ˜ ğ˜¡0123456789 ',
                  's': 'ğ“ªğ“«ğ“¬ğ“­ğ“®ğ“¯ğ“°ğ“±ğ“²ğ“³ğ“´ğ“µğ“¶ğ“·ğ“¸ğ“¹ğ“ºğ“»ğ“¼ğ“½ğ“¾ğ“¿ğ”€ğ”ğ”‚ğ”ƒğ“ğ“‘ğ“’ğ““ğ“”ğ“•ğ“–ğ“—ğ“˜ğ“™ğ“šğ“›ğ“œğ“ğ“ğ“Ÿğ“ ğ“¡ğ“¢ğ“£ğ“¤ğ“¥ğ“¦ğ“§ğ“¨ğ“©0123456789 ',
                  'g': 'ğ”ğ”Ÿğ” ğ”¡ğ”¢ğ”£ğ”¤ğ”¥ğ”¦ğ”§ğ”¨ğ”©ğ”ªğ”«ğ”¬ğ”­ğ”®ğ”¯ğ”°ğ”±ğ”²ğ”³ğ”´ğ”µğ”¶ğ”·ğ”„ğ”…â„­ğ”‡ğ”ˆğ”‰ğ”Šâ„Œâ„‘ğ”ğ”ğ”ğ”ğ”‘ğ”’ğ”“ğ””â„œğ”–ğ”—ğ”˜ğ”™ğ”šğ”›ğ”œâ„¨0123456789 ',
                  'f': 'ğ’‚ğ’ƒğ’„ğ’…ğ’†ğ’‡ğ’ˆğ’‰ğ’Šğ’‹ğ’Œğ’ğ’ğ’ğ’ğ’‘ğ’’ğ’“ğ’”ğ’•ğ’–ğ’—ğ’˜ğ’™ğ’šğ’›ğ‘¨ğ‘©ğ‘ªğ‘«ğ‘¬ğ‘­ğ‘®ğ‘¯ğ‘°ğ‘±ğ‘²ğ‘³ğ‘´ğ‘µğ‘¶ğ‘·ğ‘¸ğ‘¹ğ‘ºğ‘»ğ‘¼ğ‘½ğ‘¾ğ‘¿ğ’€ğ’0123456789 '
              }

              src = 'abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyzABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ0123456789 '
              text_to_convert = r'''{{text}}'''
              style_key = '{{style}}'

              if style_key in style_map:
                table = str.maketrans(src, style_map[style_key])
                print(text_to_convert.translate(table), end='')
